Reviews.Title: “Economical and well placed”
Reviews.Author: Sirish_21
Reviews.Content: downtown prefer economical living luckily staff understands speaks little english convenient perspective exploring mexico city hotel walking distance metro stations juarez couple metrobus stations near artisan market 45 mins walk hotel didnt hotel payment everyday morning staff friendly greets smile staff little rude probably language barrier

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel ever been!”
Reviews.Author: traveller854
Reviews.Content: am student slept lot hotels hostel none bad onethis hotel nice look outside reasonable thats starts arrive receptionist extremely unfriendly staff terribly unfriendly goes hotel clean proper internet normal hotel bed rock hard couldn´t sleep sleep night 4 hours friend backpain actually stay week night skip hotel dont care comfort service hotel hostel half price probably service called hotel honest opinion please dont hotel am hotel segovia regency cost 160 pesos persons friendly competent staff nice

Reviews.Title: “Good place to visit Mexico Center”
Reviews.Author: Damslapougne
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 night staff isnt sympathetic job location 10min walk historic center 2min walk metro station juarez quiet mexico city services breakfast included theres restaurant breakfast expensive ok theres free wifi provide pc youll pay dont recommand payment system isnt pratical expensive internet cafe 200m north east 4m clean beds hard confortable chose court view dont expect view quiet recommand hotel visit mexico city staff isnt friendly

Reviews.Title: “No frills, not bad”
Reviews.Author: juan_maldonado
Reviews.Content: price pretty close fun middle historic center clean stayed sunday night loud street 10 pm died staff unsmiling dont care sort fine little eerie extremely efficient service blank stares stayed nights mornings natural gas odor little unsettling phoned restaurant free discounted breakfasts guests answer pretty rude worries theres plenty eat nearby lastly phoned nearby restaurant hours call minute charge wound 32 pesos yikes

Reviews.Content: hotel nice staff friendly speak little spanish able communicate spoke little english restaurant nice eat couple time restaurants couple blocks traveling 20 people elevator time stuff upstairs sound carries hallways hear neighbors conversations washcloths common mexico bring own location sight seeing walking distance
